article: seven weeks after charles c. conaway took over as chairman and chief executive of kmart corp. , the company announced that it would take a $ ### pretax charge for inventory clearance and store closings and indicated that a substantial investment in technology would be key to future growth .
abstract: earnings will drop sharply kmart warns
